title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1090/96 of 17 June 1996 fixing, in respect of the 1995/96 marketing year, actual production of unginned cotton and the amounts by which the guide price is to be reduced and aid is to be increased
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1090/96 of 17 June 1996 fixing, in respect of the 1995/96 marketing year, actual production of unginned cotton and the amounts by which the guide price is to be reduced and aid is to be increased
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. (a) For the 1995/96 marketing year, actual production of unginned cotton is fixed at 1 469 198 tonnes, of which 1 364 798 tonnes for Greece and 104 400 tonnes for Spain.
(b) For the 1995/96 marketing year, actual production of unginned cotton is fixed at one tonne for Portugal.
2. The amount by which the guide price is to be reduced for the 1995/96 marketing year is fixed at ECU 29,764/100 kg for Greece.
3. The amount by which aid is to be increased is fixed at ECU 7,973/100 kg for Greece.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission
